backend/main.mo: Backend canister handling user profiles, inquiries, and invoices with access control and special logic for anonymous LOC invoice creation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping detailing removed Intake UI elements, affected frontend files, related components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root app container and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, routes, layout, React Query provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/ClaimDetailsDial: Dialog component displaying invoice claim details and hospice day counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with dropdown menus for billing, hospice, and account sections using router state and click/keyboard handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity or actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling authentication state, login, logout, and persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocInvoiceReceivab: Hooks for fetching and deleting LOC receivables, including optimistic cache updates and detailed deletion result handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for inquiries, LOC inquiries, and invoices, supporting fetch, create, update, and delete operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based theme definitions with healthcare-styled color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Billing.tsx: Renders the Billing page with feature cards for invoices, payments, insurance claims, and financial reports.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays the home page with a hero section and a services feature linking to the Billing page.
frontend/src/pages/HospiceBilling.tsx: Simple page providing a header and description for hospice billing management.
frontend/src/pages/Intake.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/IntakeRedirect.tsx: Automatically redirects users to the Billing page on mount.
Manages LOC invoice receivables, including display, selection, deletion, and viewing invoice details.
frontend/src/pages/ManifestLocBilling.ts: Loads and displays a LOC inquiry and allows invoice creation from it with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ManifestRbBilling.tsx: Renders an R&B manifest table with selectable records and placeholder invoice creation logic.
frontend/src/pages/RbInvoiceReceivable.t: Displays and manages R&B receivable invoices with selection and deletion capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/Ub04Form.tsx: Renders a UB04 form preview with a red-lined template image and simple overlay fields plus a back button.
frontend/src/utils/authErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes backend auth and network error messages into user-friendly text and detects auth-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/deleteResultsMessagin: Formats bulk delete outcomes into short success or error messages and extracts simplified failure reasons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, objectives, architectural notes, and known issues for the billing-focused app.
